bonuses.name: Resolve + Precision
bonuses.value: +70 Health

bonuses.name: Resolve + Domination
bonuses.value: +70 Health

bonuses.name: Resolve + Sorcery
bonuses.value: +70 Health

bonuses.name: Resolve + Inspiration
bonuses.value: +105 Health

runes.name: Grasp of the Undying
runes.longDescription:
Every 4 seconds in combat, your next basic attack on a Champion will:
  • Deal bonus damage equal to 3% of your max health
    Heal you for 1.5% of your max health
    Permanently increase your health by 5

    • Ranged Champions: Damage and healing are halved and gain 2 permanent health instead.
runes.shortDescription: Every 4 seconds your next attack on a champion deals bonus damage, heals you, and permanently increases your health.

runes.name: Guardian
runes.longDescription:
Right clicking an allied champion places a guard on that ally for 3 seconds. Before you or that ally would take damage, you're both granted a shield for 2.5 seconds. 45 second cooldown, 6 seconds if the shield doesn't activate.

Shield total strength: 110 - 250 +(0.15 AP) + (+10% bonus health).
runes.shortDescription: Right-clicking on an allied champion grants you both a shield.

runes.name: Aftershock
runes.longDescription:
After immobilizing an enemy champion, increase your current Armor and Magic resist by 10 + 30% for 2.5 seconds. Then, after 2.5 deal damage to nearby enemies.

Damage: 40-140 (+3.5% of your maximum health) adaptive
Cooldown: 20s
runes.shortDescription: After immobilizing an enemy champion gain defenses and later deal a burst of damage around you.

runes.name: Perseverance
runes.longDescription: After casting a Summoner Spell, gain 25% Tenacity and 25% Slow Resistance for 10 seconds. Increase your bonus Armor and Magic resist by 7% for each Summoner Spell on cooldown.
runes.shortDescription: After casting a Summoner Spell, gain Tenacity and Slow Resistance for a moderate duration. Then, increase your bonus Armor and Magic Resist for each Summoner Spell on cooldown.

runes.name: Demolish
runes.longDescription:
Charge up a powerful attack against a tower over 4 seconds, while within 600 range of it. The charged attack deals 375 (+20% of your max health) bonus physical damage.

Cooldown: 60 seconds
runes.shortDescription: Charge up a powerful attack against a tower while near it.

runes.name: Font of Life
runes.longDescription:
Impairing the movement of an enemy champion marks them for 4 seconds.

Ally champions who attack marked enemies heal for 5 + 1.0% of your max health.

(Healing values are reduced to a third for your own attacks.)
runes.shortDescription: Impairing the movement of an enemy champion marks them. You and your allies heal when attacking champions you've marked.

runes.name: Iron Skin
runes.longDescription: Gain 3 Armor. Whenever you heal for at least 20 health or from a consumable's effect, increase your Armor by 5% for 3 seconds.
runes.shortDescription: Gain 3 Armor. Whenever you heal for at least 20 health or from a consumable's effect, increase your Armor by 5% for 3 seconds.

runes.name: Mirror Shell
runes.longDescription: Gain 3 Magic Resist. Whenever you heal for at least 20 health or from a consumable's effect, increase your Magic Resist by 5% for 3 seconds.
runes.shortDescription: Gain 3 Magic Resist. Whenever you heal for at least 20 health or from a consumable's effect, increase your Magic Resist by 5% for 3 seconds.

runes.name: Conditioning
runes.longDescription:
After 10 minutes gain 6 Armor and 6 Magic Resist and increase your total Armor and Magic Resist by 5%.

Range: 800 units
runes.shortDescription: After 10 minutes gain 6 Armor and 6 Magic Resist and increase your total Armor and Magic Resist by 5%.

runes.name: Overgrowth
runes.longDescription:
Every 10 monsters or enemy minions that die near you permanently increase your max health by 0.2%.

Range: 1400 units
runes.shortDescription: Every 10 monsters or enemy minions that die near you permanently increase your max health by 0.2%.

runes.name: Revitalize
runes.longDescription: Heals and shields are 5% stronger and increased by an additional 10% on targets below 40% health.
runes.shortDescription: Heals and shields are 5% stronger and increased by an additional 10% on targets below 40% health.

runes.name: Second Wind
runes.longDescription: After taking damage from an enemy champion heal for 4% of your missing health over 10 seconds.
runes.shortDescription: Restore health over time based on your missing health.

bonuses.name: Domination + Inspiration
bonuses.value: +15 Ability Power or +10.5 Attack Damage, Adaptive

bonuses.name: Domination + Resolve
bonuses.value: +10 Ability Power or +7.0 Attack Damage, Adaptive

bonuses.name: Domination + Sorcery
bonuses.value: +10 Ability Power or +7.0 Attack Damage, Adaptive

bonuses.name: Domination + Precision
bonuses.value: +10 Ability Power or +7.0 Attack Damage, Adaptive

runes.name: Electrocute
runes.longDescription:
Hitting a champion with 3 unique attacks or abilities within 2 seconds deals bonus adaptive damage.

Damage: 60 - 220 (+0.50 bonus AD, +0.3 AP) damage.

Cooldown: 50-25 seconds
runes.shortDescription: Hitting a champion with 3 unique attacks or abilities in 2 seconds deals bonus magic damage.

runes.name: Predator
runes.longDescription:
Enchants your boots with the active effect 'Predator.'

Channel for 3 seconds out of combat to gain 45% movement speed for 15 seconds. Damaging attacks or abilities end this effect, dealing 60 - 140 (+0.2 bonus AD)(+0.3 AP) bonus adaptive damage.

180 second cooldown. Starts the game on cooldown and goes on cooldown if interrupted while channeling.
runes.shortDescription: Add an active effect to your boots that grants a large boost of movement speed and causes your next attack or spell to deal bonus damage.

runes.name: Dark Harvest
runes.longDescription:
Champions, large minions, and large monsters drop soul essence on death. Collecting souls causes your next attack on a champion or structure within 20 seconds to deal bonus adaptive damage.

Bonus damage: 60 - 100 (+0.15 bonus AD) (+0.1 AP) + soul essence collected


Champion souls grant 10 soul essence.
Monster souls grant 2 soul essence.
Minion souls grant 5 soul essence.
runes.shortDescription: Champions, large minions, and large monsters drop soul essence on death. Touch souls to absorb them and deal bonus damage on your next attack based on total soul essence collected.

runes.name: Zombie Ward
runes.longDescription:
After killing an enemy ward, a friendly Zombie Ward is raised in its place. If you already had a ward in the brush where the Zombie Ward would spawn, it instead replaces your trinket for up to 30 seconds.

Zombie Wards are visible, last for 180 seconds and don't count towards your ward limit.
runes.shortDescription: After killing an enemy ward, a friendly Zombie Ward is raised in its place.

runes.name: Ghost Poro
runes.longDescription:
Enter a brush to summon a poro after a brief channel (channel interupted by damage and casting other spells). The poro will stay behind to give you vision until you summon a new one.

If an enemy enters brush with a poro in it, they scare it away, putting this effect on a 30 seconds cooldown.
runes.shortDescription: When you enter brush, a poro appears. It will stay behind to give you vision.

runes.name: Eyeball Collection
runes.longDescription: Gain +2 Ability Power or +1.4 Attack Damage, Adaptive permanently on champion takedown, and half of that on ward takedowns.
runes.shortDescription: Gain +2 Ability Power or +1.4 Attack Damage, Adaptive permanently on champion takedown, and half of that on ward takedowns.

runes.name: Cheap Shot
runes.longDescription:
Damaging champions with impaired movement or actions deals 12 - 30 bonus true damage (based on level).

Cooldown: 4 seconds
runes.shortDescription: Deal bonus true damage to enemies with impaired movement or actions.

runes.name: Taste of Blood
runes.longDescription:
Heal when you damage an enemy champion.

Healing: 18-35 (+0.20 bonus AD, +0.1 AP) health (based on level)
Cooldown: 20
runes.shortDescription: Recover health when you damage an enemy champion.

runes.name: Sudden Impact
runes.longDescription: Using a dash, leap, blink, or teleport grants you 5% additional damage against champions for the next 3 seconds.
runes.shortDescription: Deal additional damage after using a dash, leap, blink, or teleport.

runes.name: Ravenous Hunter
runes.longDescription:
Heal for a percentage of the damage dealt by your abilities.

Healing: 2.5% + 2.5% per Bounty Hunter stack.

Earn a Bounty Hunter stack the first time you get a takedown on each enemy champion.


Healing reduced to one third on AoE abilities.
runes.shortDescription: Heal for a percentage of damage dealt with your abilities. Increases with each unique takedown.

runes.name: Ingenious Hunter
runes.longDescription:
Gain 1% Active Item CDR plus an additional 6% per Bounty Hunter stack (includes Trinkets).

Earn a Bounty Hunter stack the first time you get a takedown on each enemy champion.
runes.shortDescription: Unique takedowns grant permanent Active Item CDR (includes Trinkets).

runes.name: Relentless Hunter
runes.longDescription:
Gain 8 out of combat Movement Speed plus 8 per Bounty Hunter stack.

Earn a Bounty Hunter stack the first time you get a takedown on each enemy champion.
runes.shortDescription: Unique takedowns grant permanent out of combat Movement Speed.

bonuses.name: Precision + Sorcery
bonuses.value: +12% Attack Speed

bonuses.name: Precision + Resolve
bonuses.value: +12% Attack Speed

bonuses.name: Precision + Inspiration
bonuses.value: +18% Attack Speed

bonuses.name: Precision + Domination
bonuses.value: +12% Attack Speed

runes.name: Press the Attack
runes.longDescription:
Attacking the same champion grants endlessly stacking attack damage (1.5-4 AD per stack, doubled for melee champions).

Stack duration 4 seconds.

When you switch targets you keep half your stacks.
runes.shortDescription: Attacking the same champion grants endlessly stacking attack damage.

runes.name: Lethal Tempo
runes.longDescription:
1.5 seconds after damaging a champion gain 30-80% Attack Speed (based on level) for 3 seconds. Attacking a champion extends the effect to 6 seconds.

Cooldown: 6 seconds

Lethal Tempo allows you to temporarily exceed the attack speed limit.
runes.shortDescription: 1.5 seconds after damaging a champion gain a large amount of attack speed. Lethal Tempo allows you to temporarily exceed the attack speed limit.

runes.name: Fleet Footwork
runes.longDescription:
Attacking and moving builds Energy stacks. At 100 stacks, your next attack is Energized.

Energized attacks heal you for 5 - 50 (+0.10 Bonus AD, +0.20 AP) and grant 30% increased movement speed for 1 second.

Deals no damage to Monsters.
runes.shortDescription: Attacking and moving builds energy stacks. At 100 stacks, your next attack heals you and grants increased movement speed.

runes.name: Overheal
runes.longDescription:
50% of excess healing becomes a decaying shield, for up to 30 + 8% of your total health.

From allies, 50% of excess healing is converted instead.
runes.shortDescription: Excess healing becomes a decaying shield for up to 30 + 8% of your total health.

runes.name: Triumph
runes.longDescription: Takedowns restore 15% of your missing health and grant an additional 25 gold.
runes.shortDescription: Takedowns restore health and grant bonus gold.

runes.name: Presence of Mind
runes.longDescription: While below 60% mana your basic attacks against champions build Focus, up to a cap of 5. Upon exiting combat, all Focus is converted into mana. Energized attacks build additional Focus.
runes.shortDescription: When low on mana, attacking champions will generate Focus which is converted into mana upon exiting combat.

runes.name: Legend: Alacrity
runes.longDescription:
Gain 5% attack speed plus an additional 3% for every Legend stack (max 5).

Gain Legend stacks for every 30 points earned:
20 points for champion takedowns
20 points for epic monster takedowns
4 points for large monster kills
1 points for minion kills
runes.shortDescription: Kill enemies to gain permanent Attack Speed.

runes.name: Legend: Tenacity
runes.longDescription:
Gain 5% tenacity plus an additional 3% for every Legend stack (max 5).

Gain Legend stacks for every 30 points earned:
20 points for champion takedowns
20 points for epic monster takedowns
4 points for large monster kills
1 points for minion kills
runes.shortDescription: Kill enemies to gain permanent Tenacity.

runes.name: Legend: Bloodline
runes.longDescription:
Gain 1% life steal for every Legend stack (max 5).

Gain Legend stacks for every 30 points earned:
20 points for champion takedowns
20 points for epic monster takedowns
4 points for large monster kills
1 points for minion kills
runes.shortDescription: Kill enemies to earn permanent Lifesteal.

runes.name: Coup de Grace
runes.longDescription: Deal 5% more damage to champions below 40% health.
runes.shortDescription: Deal 5% more damage to low health champions.

runes.name: Cut Down
runes.longDescription: Deal up to 8% more damage to champions based on how much more health they have than you.
runes.shortDescription: Deal up to 8% more damage to all champions with more health than you.

runes.name: Last Stand
runes.longDescription: Deal up to 5% more damage to champions while below 80% health.
runes.shortDescription: Deal more damage to champions while you are low on health.

bonuses.name: Sorcery + Precision
bonuses.value: +15 Ability Power or +10.5 Attack Damage, Adaptive

bonuses.name: Sorcery + Inspiration
bonuses.value: +22.5 Ability Power or +15.8 Attack Damage, Adaptive

bonuses.name: Sorcery + Resolve
bonuses.value: +15 Ability Power or +10.5 Attack Damage, Adaptive

bonuses.name: Sorcery + Domination
bonuses.value: +15 Ability Power or +10.5 Attack Damage, Adaptive

runes.name: Summon Aerie
runes.longDescription:
Your attacks and abilities send Aerie to a target damaging enemies or shielding allies.

Damage: 10 + 40 based on level +0.1AP or +0.15 bonus AD
Shield: 40 - 100 based on level +0.25AP or +0.25 bonus AD

"Spirit" cannot be sent out again until she returns to you.
runes.shortDescription: Your attacks and abilities send Aerie to a target, damaging enemies or shielding allies.

runes.name: Arcane Comet
runes.longDescription:
Damaging a champion with an ability hurls a comet at their location.

Damage (Adaptive): 40 - 100 based on level (+0.2AP and 0.35 bonus AD)

Cooldown: 20 - 8 seconds
runes.shortDescription: Hitting a champion with a spell hurls a damaging comet at them.

runes.name: Phase Rush
runes.longDescription:
Hitting an enemy champion with 3 unique attacks or abilities within 2 seconds grants 30 - 60% Movement Speed based on level.

Melee: Additionally, gain 75% Slow Resistance for the duration.

Duration: 3 seconds
Cooldown: 15 seconds
runes.shortDescription: Hitting an enemy champion with 3 unique attacks or abilities grants a burst of Movement Speed.

runes.name: Nullifying Orb
runes.longDescription:
At 30% health gain a magic damage shield blocking 30 - 120 based on level (+10% AP or +15% AD).

Cooldown: 60 seconds.
runes.shortDescription: Gain a magic damage shield when low on health.

runes.name: Manaflow Band
runes.longDescription: Every 60 seconds, your next ability used has its mana or energy cost refunded, and restores 10% of your missing mana or energy.
runes.shortDescription: Periodically your next ability used has its mana or energy cost refunded and restores some of your missing mana or energy.

runes.name: The Ultimate Hat
runes.longDescription: Your ultimate's cooldown is reduced by 5%. This number is increased by 2.0% each time your ultimate goes on cooldown. Stacks up to 5 times.
runes.shortDescription: Gain cooldown reduction and max cooldown reduction on your ultimate. This is increased further each time you use your ultimate, up to a maximum.

runes.name: Transcendence
runes.longDescription:
Gain 10% CDR when you reach level 10.

Each percent of CDR exceeding the CDR limit is converted to +2 Ability Power or +1.4 Attack Damage, Adaptive.
runes.shortDescription: Gain 10% CDR when you reach level 10. Excess CDR becomes AP or AD (Adaptive).

runes.name: Celerity
runes.longDescription: Gain 3% increased Movement Speed and add 8% of your Bonus Movement Speed to your AP or AD, Adaptive (based on level).
runes.shortDescription: Gain 3% extra <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key="LinkTooltip_Description_MS">MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>. Gain extra AP or AD based on your bonus Movement Speed.

runes.name: Absolute Focus
runes.longDescription: While above 70% health, gain up to +40 Ability Power or +28.0 Attack Damage, Adaptive (based on level)
runes.shortDescription: While above 70% health, gain up to +40 Ability Power or +28.0 Attack Damage, Adaptive (based on level)

runes.name: Scorch
runes.longDescription:
Your next ability hit sets champions on fire dealing 10 - 40 bonus magic damage based on level.

Cooldown: 20-8 seconds.
runes.shortDescription: Your first ability hit every 20 seconds burns champions.

runes.name: Waterwalking
runes.longDescription: Gain 25 Movement Speed and up to +30 Ability Power or +21.0 Attack Damage, Adaptive (based on level) when in the river.
runes.shortDescription: Gain Movement Speed and AP or AD (Adaptive) in the river.

runes.name: Gathering Storm
runes.longDescription:
Every 10 minutes gain AP or AD (Adaptive).

10 min: + 8 AP or 6 AD
20 min: + 24 AP or 18 AD
30 min: + 48 AP or 36 AD
40 min: + 80AP or 60 AD
50 min: + 120 AP or 90 AD
60 min: + 168 AP or 126 AD
etc...
runes.shortDescription: Gain increasing amounts of AD or AP (Adaptive) over the course of the game.

bonuses.name: Inspiration + Domination
bonuses.value:
+20% Potion and Elixir Duration
+15 Ability Power or +10.5 Attack Damage, Adaptive

bonuses.name: Inspiration + Sorcery
bonuses.value:
+20% Potion and Elixir Duration
+12 Ability Power or +8.4 Attack Damage, Adaptive

bonuses.name: Inspiration + Resolve
bonuses.value:
+20% Potion and Elixir Duration
+56 Health

bonuses.name: Inspiration + Precision
bonuses.value:
+20% Potion and Elixir Duration
+10% Attack Speed

runes.name: Glacial Augment
runes.longDescription:
Basic attacking a champion slows them for 2 seconds (6-3 second per-unit cooldown). The slow increases in strength over its duration.
  • Ranged attacks slow by up to 25% - 40%
    Melee attacks slow by up to 35% - 50%

    • Slowing a champion with active items shoots a freeze ray through them, freezing the nearby ground for 5 seconds, slowing all units inside by 50% (max 3 rays per item use).
runes.shortDescription: Your first attack against an enemy champion slows them (per unit cooldown). Slowing champions with active items shoots a freeze ray at them, creating a lingering slow zone.

runes.name: Summoner Specialist
runes.longDescription:
Gain 15% Summoner Spell cooldown reduction and you can swap one of your Summoner Spells to a different one at the shop for 1 Summoner Shard.

Gain your first Summoner Shard at 2 minutes, and another every 6 minutes after. (Max 2 shards)

(Buying a Smite won't grant access to Smite items)
(You cannot have two of the same Summoner Spells)
runes.shortDescription: Get Summoner Shards and exchange them at the shop to change your Summoner Spells.

runes.name: Hextech Flashtraption
runes.longDescription:
While Flash is on cooldown it is replaced by Hexflash.

Hexflash: Channel for 2.5 seconds to blink to a new location.

Cooldown: 20 seconds. Goes on a 10 second cooldown when you enter champion combat.
runes.shortDescription:
While Flash is on cooldown it is replaced by Hexflash.

Hexflash: Channel, then blink to a new location.

runes.name: Biscuit Delivery
runes.longDescription:
Biscuit Delivery: Gain a Total Biscuit of Everlasting Will every 3 minutes, until 12 minutes.

Biscuits restore 15% of your missing health and mana and increase your mana cap by 40 mana permanently.

Champions without mana restore 20% missing health instead.
runes.shortDescription: Get a free Biscuit every 3 minutes, until 12 minutes. Biscuits heal and permanently increase your max mana.

runes.name: Perfect Timing
runes.longDescription:
Start the game with a Commencing Stopwatch that transforms into a Stopwatch after 6 minutes. Stopwatch has a one time use Stasis effect.

Reduces the cooldown of Zhonyas Hourglass, Guardian Angel, and Gargoyle's Stoneplate by 15%.
runes.shortDescription: Gain a free Stopwatch. Stopwatch has a one time use Stasis active.

runes.name: Magical Footwear
runes.longDescription:
You get free Slightly Magical Boots at 10 minutes, you cannot buy boots before then.

Slightly Magical Boots give you an additional +10 movement speed and upgrades for 50 gold less.
runes.shortDescription: You get free boots at 10 minutes but you cannot buy boots before then. These boots give additional MS.

runes.name: Future's Market
runes.longDescription:
You can enter debt to buy items. The amount you can borrow increases over time.

Debt limit: 150 + 5/minute

Lending Fee: 50 gold per item
runes.shortDescription: You can enter debt to buy items.

runes.name: Minion Dematerializer
runes.longDescription:
Start the game with 6 Minion Sojourners that kills and absorbs lane minions instantly. Minion Sojourners are on cooldown for the first 155 seconds of the game.

Absorbing a minion increases your damage by +4% against that type of minion permanently, and an extra +1% for each additional minion of that type absorbed.
runes.shortDescription: Start the game with 6 Minion Sojourners. Killing minions with the item gives permanent bonus damage vs. that minion type.

runes.name: Cosmic Insight
runes.longDescription:
+5% Cooldown Reduction
+5% Max Cooldown Reduction
+5% Summoner Spell Cooldown Reduction
+5% Item Cooldown Reduction
runes.shortDescription:
+5% Cooldown Reduction
+5% Max Cooldown Reduction
+5% Summoner Spell Cooldown Reduction
+5% Item Cooldown Reduction

runes.name: Approach Velocity
runes.longDescription:
Gain 10% Movement Speed towards nearby allies that are CC'ed or enemies that you CC.

Range: 1000
runes.shortDescription: Bonus Movement Speed towards nearby allies that are CC'ed or enemies that you CC.

runes.name: Celestial Body
runes.longDescription:
+ 100 Health permanently
- 5% Damage to Champions until 10 minutes
runes.shortDescription: +100 permanent Health at the cost of early champion damage
